NOTE 1 Polarity tests of submains, final subcircuits, and switches that rely on the circuit under test being energized cannot be relied on to provide valid results unless polarity of the supply to the installation has first been confirmed as correct.
NOTE 2 Live testing with MEN connected cannot detect N-E transposition. Always confirm correct connection of protective earthing conductors before testing for polarity.
